title: poppler-data(Windows)编译
content:
以Windows平台举例

下载 poppler-data ，进入目录

下载链接

https://poppler.freedesktop.org/

cmake . -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=E:
mingw32-make
mingw32-make install
more:
